name: Mini Photo Editor
description:
A lil Photo Editor powered by Pintura.


Makes it easy to quickly crop, rotate, flip, filter, finetune, and redact images.


Transforms:

Crop, turn, flip, rotate, zoom


Color adjustments:

Brightness, contrast, gamma, clarity, saturation, exposure, temperature, vignette


Filters:

A selection of high quality filters


Redaction:

An image redaction tool for secure censoring of information in images. Image data is first scrambled then blurred making retrieval of original data impossible.
